messages.title: My Pledges to You
messages.content: I will fight to protect our local public services, defend our NHS and our schools. I will be a strong voice standing up to protect pensioners' incomes and campaigning for a £10 minimum wage, jobs and prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to protect our local public services, defend our NHS and schools.
Standing up to protect pensioners' incomes and campaigning for a £10 minimum wage, jobs, and prosperity.
Campaign to improve living standards, make communities safer and deliver the NHS and schools.
Oppose a hard, chaotic crash out of Europe to protect jobs and services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Cardiff North, Welsh Labour is the only Party that can defeat the Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: Must not give the Tories a free hand to endanger jobs and services.
issues.education: Campaign to improve schools and the education opportunities our children deserve.
issues.labourEmployment: Protect pensioners' incomes, campaign for a £10 minimum wage, jobs, and prosperity.

community.content: Improve communities' safety and deliver better jobs and housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud to be standing in Cardiff North, where I lived for 15 years and where my children go to school. I know our local people and our local challenges, and, at a time of great uncertainty, have the knowledge and experience to stand up and fight to protect our public services and deliver better jobs and housing. In Cardiff North, Welsh Labour is the only Party that can defeat the Tories. Anna

endorsements.endorsement: Anna will be a strong voice for you as MP. I know she will listen to your concerns and argue your case, turning strong principles into positive action on jobs, the environment and a fairer society.

examples: I will be a strong voice
at a time of great uncertainty
only Party that can defeat the Tories
Oppose a hard, chaotic crash out of Europe to protect jobs and services

personalStories.story: I'm proud to be standing in Cardiff North, where I lived for 15 years and where my children go to school.

examples: Anna will be a strong voice for you as MP.
Must not give the Tories a free hand to endanger jobs and services.
Theresa May forces us into a hard, chaotic crash out of Europe.
